author: costin
msg: In order for JMX to work well, the names must be stable and the components
must know their names and the names of the others. That's why I'm trying
to get all important components aware of JMX - and slowly deprecate

author: costin
msg: Extra checks if the object is already registered ( to avoid errors )
If a .ser file exists - try to use it first.

author: costin
msg: Added a "baseDir" attribute. In theory you should be able to have more engines
in a JVM - but if all use catalina.base system property it won't work.
Added JMX hooks to self-register in the Service - in JMX components
can be loaded/reloaded in an arbitrary order.
Use log for the start message instead of System.out.
